Articles.Content: Was looking for space forums and found this one wich lead me to game lol. I also found X-Plane and a game called Orbiter too. Finally made it into orbit afer a two hour attempt. I used all my fuel to do it so the Kerbs were stuck there for 12 hour before I called it a loss .......jebediah didn't seem to mind though.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky
